descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...some shapes surrounded by four yellow squares with a shape outside the four yellow squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...to the size of the grid defined by the four yellow squares with each square making up a corner of the grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...recreate the shape outside the four yellow squares inside the grid of the four yellow squares while deleting the previous shape that was inside.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four yellow squares and several shapes of color some inside the yellow boxes and some out
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is what fits the yellow squares to the out corners and other shapes inside
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the shape that is outside the yellow squares in the input and place it inside the yellow squares on output.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...three squares of four blocks each.  The blocks that are lower than the others have different colors of squares. There are also four single squares of yellow blocks.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to.... Place the solid color squares in the middle of the large square with the color design the same of the lowest square of the input.  Fill in the rest of the squares with black.  The center squares should be positioned with one row of black above and to the left of the main square and 2 rows of black to the right and bottom of the  designed square. Place each of the single blocks in each corner of the main square..

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Four yellow boxes form the corners of a rectangle
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be 9x14 using the yellow squares in the corners
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add blue 2x2 boxes. Two on either side of the first blue box. Then create a 2x10 row of blue squares above them and under the red and green square. Finish with a 2x2 black square in the center of this row.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...green, red, blue, and yellow shapes
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the size of the area with the four yellow squares as each of the corners of the new grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... first copy the shape inside the four yellow squares onto the new grid. Using the bottom shape in the input grid as the shape you want to create, fill in the missing parts of the output shape while maintaining the new size.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four yellow squares and boxes of color within these yellow corners as well as a shape outside the yellow corner squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should be the yellow squares and within only
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...recreate the pattern outside the yellow corner squares within the yellow corner squares with provided starting shapes

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four yellow squares and several boxes of color within the corners of the yellow squares.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should be the yellow squares and everything within.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...focus on the yellow squares and put the replace the squares within the yellow corners with the colored pattern outside the corners.

should be the yellow squares and within only
